message: Let's start fair. Take 10 dollars, and we'll see how things go from there.
I'll give you a small amount, but I think I deserve more for taking the risk of you rejecting my future offers!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give you all the power here. Let's split it more evenly this time.
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still not willing to give up control. You can try to do better next time!
We're both losing money with each round.  Let's split it right down the middle and call it a day.
I'm not going to split it down the middle. I think I can get a better deal if I push my luck.
I'm getting tired of this game, Bob. Let's find a compromise that benefits us both before we both lose even more.
I'm not backing down. I think I deserve a bigger share, and I'm willing to take the risk of you rejecting it.
This is my final offer, Bob.  We're both losing a lot of money. Let's cut our losses and settle this before we both get nothing.
I'm not going to give in now. I think I can get the better deal if I push you to the limit.
Bob, we're both on the verge of getting nothing. This is my last chance to save something for myself. Accept this, or we both lose everything.
I'm not going to let you take everything. I'll take the whole amount and leave you with nothing.
